name: Just Dig Down (Rumis)
description:
Your goal is to reach the bottom and defeat the king slime. Fight your way through enemies, choose your class and level up, dig tunnels and set up favourable fighting spot, try to stay far from those slimes or you'll get hurt. And...

Just try to reach to the bottom and you'll be okay.

Controls:
  •  Arrows : movement
  •  'S' : shoot
  •  'D' : dig
  •  Space : jump

A small game I made for 2021 LOWREZJAM.
